items.brandText: Fenty Beauty Fat Water Pore- Refining Toner Serum with Niacinamide
items.prosText: Pulls double duty as a toner and a serum
items.content: Dr. Hartman credits Fenty Skin’s Fat Water Pore-Refining Toner Serum—which is one-part toner, one-part serum—to deliver “a brightening and toning effect without stripping away too much oil.” The subtly sweet fruity scent, which features cherry and fig, is an added bonus.
